casebody.data:
Pamela O'DONNELL, Individually, as Administratrix Ad Prosequendum for the Estate of Timothy O'Donnell, as Administratrix Ad Prosequendum for the Estate of B.O., a Minor, and as Guardian ad Litem of A.O., a Minor, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
NEW JERSEY TURNPIKE AUTHORITY, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Service McCabe Ambulance, Elisar Morales and Scott Hahn, Defendants. C-869 September Term 2017
080735 Supreme Court of New Jersey. May 21, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

**408A petition for certification of the judgment in A-001431-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
